ValidationRule.description: Certain fields can only be modified by Sys Admin or Bank Channel Manager profiles to ensure the integrity of the data
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( AND
( NOT(BEGINS($UserRole.Name, "Strategic Accounts")) , NOT(BEGINS($UserRole.Name,'BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT')), NOT(BEGINS($UserRole.Name,'System Administrator')), NOT(BEGINS($UserRole.Name,'Sales Account Manager')), $Profile.Id <>"00e70000001JtU2", $Profile.Id <>"00e70000001JszN", $Profile.Id <>"00e7000000144Z9" ), Managed_by_Channel__c=TRUE, OR( ISCHANGED( Name ), ISCHANGED( Phone__c ), ISCHANGED( Street_Address_1__c ), ISCHANGED( Street_Address_2__c ), ISCHANGED( City__c ), ISCHANGED( State_Province__c ), ISCHANGED( Zip_Postal_Code__c ), ISCHANGED( Referral_Source_Business_Type__c )))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Name, Phone, Address, and Referral Source Business Type can only be edited by System Admin, Bank Channel Managers and National Account Managers.
